headline: Apple looks to India, Micron adds surcharge: Trending Tickers
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Alexandra Canal examine some of the day's top trending tickers. Apple (AAPL) is reportedly shifting sourcing to India due to US President Trump's tariffs on imports from China, according to reporting from the Wall Street Journal. Starting on Wednesday, Micron Technology (MU) will reportedly add a surcharge on some products to pass on rising costs to customers due to tariffs, Reuters reports. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
